member.name: ICredentialProviderFilter.Filter
member.summary: Evaluates whether a list of credential providers should be allowed to provide credential tiles.
member.param: A pointer to a value that declares the scenarios in which a credential provider is supported.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Usage scenario flags. This parameter is valid only if cpus is CPUS_CREDUI. They are defined in Wincred.h.
Plain text username/password is being requested.
Only credential providers that support the input authentication package should enumerate.
Only the incoming credential for the specific authentication package should be enumerated.

member.param: A pointer to an array of credential provider CLSIDs.

param.name: rgbAllow
param.para: On entry, a pointer to an array of BOOL values, one for each corresponding member of the rgclsidProviders array, all initialized to TRUE.
On exit, contains TRUE if the corresponding credential provider in rgclsidProviders is allowed to provide a credential tile; otherwise, FALSE.

member.param: The number of members in rgbAllow or rgclsidProviders (they should be the same).

member.name: ICredentialProviderFilter.UpdateRemoteCredential
member.summary: Updates a credential from a remote session.
member.param: A constant pointer to a structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderFilter
member.summary: Used to dynamically filter credential providers based on information available at runtime.
